headline.main: Poland Wants Center-Right MEP to Replace Tusk as European Council Head
headline.print_headline: Poland Wants Center-Right MEP to Replace Tusk as European Council Head

lead_paragraph: Poland named a center-right MEP as its candidate for European Council President on Saturday after it said it would oppose the re-appointment of former prime minister Donald Tusk as the chairman of EU leaders.
snippet: Poland named a center-right MEP as its candidate for European Council President on Saturday after it said it would oppose the re-appointment of former prime minister Donald Tusk as the chairman of EU leaders....
